entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening and after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon except 40 near Juan de Fuca Strait late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
